Why wait? It’s time to level up your next internal event

Payments acceptance and optimixxcv

The era of remote work is here to stay – with an estimated 82% of us able to continue working from home, fully or partially.

But, this statistic might surprise you… Did you know that 11 million video meetings happen everyday, and over half of them are internal?

    $7 trillion dollars in lost productivity, according to Gallup.Meanwhile, organizations with high levels of employee engagement are more profitable,

Payments acceptance and optimizations

The era of remote work is here to stay – with an estimated 82% of us able to continue working from home, fully or partially. So, it shouldn’t come as a huge surprise that we are partaking in more online events and meetings than ever before. But, this statistic might surprise you… Did you know that 11 million video meetings happen everyday, and over half of them are internal?

The era of remote work is here to stay – with an estimated 82% of us able to continue working from home, fully or partially. So, it shouldn’t come as a huge surprise that we are partaking in more online events and meetings than ever before. But, this statistic might surprise you… Did you know that 11 million video meetings happen everyday, and over half of them are internal?

EventsWallet is an innovative SaaS event platform for in-person, virtual, and hybrid events. The platform allows expo and conference organisers to run an effective event by keeping the audience engaged with easy-to-use event management and communication web and app tools.
